metadata.title: CVE-2024-52333 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in thedetermineMinMax functionality of OFFIS DCMTK 3.6.8. A specially craftedDICOM file can lead to an out-of-bounds write. An attacker can provide amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
